152.movie_plot: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

58.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

89.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

163.movie_plot: Owner of a failing club seeks infamous Irish singer Josef Locke in order to bring business and success to his club

86.movie_plot: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

15.movie_plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

126.movie_plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

17.movie_plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

116.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

57.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

109.movie_plot: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

107.movie_plot: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly 80 days.
